projet.frigo

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • projet.frigo.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICAD

    public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICAD
    A simulator of an Arduino.

    To use if the Arduino is not connected to the computer
